miniasm
=======

# Available modules


The overview below shows which miniasm installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using miniasm, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load miniasm/0.3-20191007-GCCcore-12.3.0
```
